Reviews.Title: My sister and I LOVE LOVE LOVE our enVue!!!
Reviews.Author: S. Wieland "mama mia"
Reviews.Content: My sister and I love Love LOVE our Envue digital photo frames!!!  Here are a few tips on using this product.1. You have to hold in the power button for a few seconds to turn it on.... I do believe it says that in the manual that  comes with it.2. When clicking on the side arrows, slide show, or the multi picture (bottom) buttons you need to make a short and quick click. This seems to work better than pushing really hard for a long time.3. Last but not least. When trying to push the middle main menu button you need to hold in in for a couple of seconds and then an hour glass will come on the screen to let you know it is going to the main menu.This item was so easy to put pictures on and use that we went back and bought a total of 6. We were able to put family photos on one and take it to my grandma in the hospital. We set it on slide show and she always had her family with her and never felt alone. With the memory card option we were able to have a slide show  almost 1000 pictures long. She loved it!!

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Mel F. Gilbert "Mel"
Reviews.Content: I received my envue for Christmas. So far it has worked flawlessly. Very easy to use and loads pics fast. My friend was not so lucky hers quit working after a week. So we shall see...

Reviews.Title: No luck...
Reviews.Author: Lois L. Harry "loisann0"
Reviews.Content: I depend on Amazons reviews to check out products before I buy. That is why I am leaving my first review. After purchasing enVue it worked the first time after I loaded in photos from computer. Since then the only thing it will do is show 1 photo, I can switch it to controls view after pushing the enter button several times, but can't open any of them. After using the reset, the only way I can shut if off, the same photo comes back up and I wait for slide show after pushing the button, and nothing happens. I actually bought 2 enVues. Afraid to try the other. I was planning to purchase another so I could have one on each level and not have to put photos on wall. Now I will have to rethink this project. This looks like a product where you just take your chances if you are a gambler.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: tom
Reviews.Content: was looking for something to read my sd cards while deep in the woods....many others costs 100's of dollars more....this little unit can be charged one time and last for over 100's of viewings....i have 8 trail cameras out and do not re charge but once a year

Reviews.Title: My experiance
Reviews.Author: duaine melton "newbie"
Reviews.Content: I was given 1 enVue for my birthday with 685 pictures on an sd card. Liked it, so ordered another thru Amazon. I am pleased with them after I finally get them programed. But getting them set up is a nightmare. Very hard to change thru the options and get everything installed. Both are the same. I haven't found the secret to this yet. But still trying. To repeat myself-both work very nice once you get done fighting the setup!

Reviews.Title: great electronic gadget!
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: I have been frustrated at the difficulty of getting prints of photos from my children.  This wonderful device solves the problem.  I can now share pictures with all my friends easily.  The size is perfect for carrying in my purse and the operation of the slide show is easy for even an oldster like me.

Reviews.Title: Quality is good, Major Design issues
Reviews.Author: Sujit Kumar Mahapatra "Sujit"
Reviews.Content: I am not sure if this was designed to be a Hand Held or desktop Digital Photo viewer. It solves half of both purposes, It is a bit too bulky for hand held and Has very small screen for Desktop. The area for the buttons is rather big than what you will expect (I wish they would have made the screen size a bit bigger in comparision to the total size). The Picture quality is good. It accepts ONLY SD (No HDSC) and MMC. You can scroll through or choose slide-show or see in Thumbnail view which is good.  The Travel charger (Which connects with the USB to power from A/C Outlet), The Auto Play software and the designer case are added advantage. Overall go for it if you find a really good deal. Not fit for this price.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: J. Wetzel
Reviews.Content: I bought this to send to my Grandmother, it seemed simple to operate and held enough pics of the grandkids to last her awhile.  I made sure it was fully charged and it turned on once and seemed fine, well that was the one and only time I got it to work.  Now it won't turn on with the power button at all, it won't load or read any pics from the card, when I hit the reset button it does power up and show the getting started slides but that's it- that's all I get.  Total waste of my money and I definitely don't recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: We're In A Recession...
Reviews.Author: F. D. Bobb "Knightcraft"
Reviews.Content: I bought this little doo-dad at Walmart.  If you go to the stationary aisle (God knows why they keep it there), you'll find them in Clearance with a red sticker.  Mine was 10-bucks.  So I bought two of them.  So far, it's a little gimmicky - moves kind of slow.  But hey...I just saw the price above (64-bucks) compared to what I spent on mine - brand new - and I'm not complaining at all.  Heh.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: D. Healey
Reviews.Content: My wife won the enVue photo viewer at a company party.  Some prize.  After charging the viewer, the only function the center button would open was "Calendar."  We could not open the other functions, no matter how long or how hard we pressed the center button.  I inserted an SD card with 10 photos on it, but the enVue insisted that there were no photos on the card.  I then plugged the EnVue into my computer.  The computer recognized the new device, but then locked up completely.  I tried it again with the same result.  Some people may have had good luck with this device, but not us.  I definitely do not recommend buying this product.

Reviews.Title: it's more then I ask for or expected...
Reviews.Author: Holly Thompson "hippy holly"
Reviews.Content: My hubby bought this for me last Christmas. At first I wondered about it, but, man, it's FANTASTIC. I am so very pleased. It has everything I wanted & needed, and more. The ease of use and clear pictures and cords and carrying case...It's PERFECT for us !!!!!!!! THANKS !!!

Reviews.Title: Love My EnVue
Reviews.Author: Collector "Collector"
Reviews.Content: Read the directions and use a little patience getting to know this little gem!Really is a super thing to have.  You can look at your digital disc and make sure you really got a good picture and show them off to everyone.  Lightweight and easy to carry in a purse or large pocket.Just make sure you put the disc in before you turn it on!Do not turn it on while it is plugged in to charge.Just hold the on button for a couple seconds as the directions say and you willlearn to to love this product.

Reviews.Title: Right Size and Portability
Reviews.Author: Sidnee Largo "mixed up movie lover"
Reviews.Content: I have given little portable keychain digital photo albums. I have given digital picture frames.  I feel bad since I have been given my enVue.  This has a battery, so it is very portable.  It has a nice size screen for showing pictures to others.  It is the perfect blend of size and portability for the average "Grandma".  Looks sharp not dorky.  Has an easel bracket and an SD slot too.

Reviews.Title: Nice Portable Photo Viewer/Album! Recommended
Reviews.Author: C. Hill "CFH"
Reviews.Content: The enVue Digital Photo Album is a fairly nice portable viewer that performs better than expected. For the price (this can often be found on sale) it is a good value. Here are my observations:Pros -* Display: Very clear 3.5" LCD Screen, pictures are shown in proper aspect ratio and are surprisingly crisp.* Functionality: The Slideshow feature works well and navigation through the individual pictures is easy using the "rose" interface.* SD/MMC Support: This was important for me since we have a bunch of 1gb cards laying around and it is nice to be able to have a card for different subjects like family pictures, vacation pictures, business pictures (we have a candle shop), etc. NOTE: No card is included, if you want to use this option you must provide your own (but they are fairly inexpensive now, see Fujifilm 1GB SD Memory Card).* Internal  Memory: If you don't want to use a SD or MMC card, you can transfer photos to the internal memory using the software that auto-loads from the enVue when you connect it to the PC (no CD load needed). This is a very basic program but works well enough.* Rechargeable Battery:  The internal rechargeable battery is long lasting (but have not confirmed the 6 hour claim) and recharges either directly from the USB cable when it is attached to the PC or to the included AC adapter. This is a very nice feature.* Table Top Stand: The unit includes a detachable stand that can be easily put on or removed as needed.* Case:  Includes a "pleather" case that looks very nice and will provide a bit of protection.Cons -* Display: Pictures in Portrait format are somewhat hard to see, Landscape format works best. Also, like many LCD displays, pictures must viewed straight on as they lose clarity when viewed form an angle.* Menu: Changing Settings in the internal menu is not as intuitive as it could be.*System: My unit was acting "flaky" when first powered on, with some options working and others not. Pressing the reset button cleared it up and there haven't been any issues since.Overall, this is a good portable Digital Album with nice features. Recommended, especially if you can find it on sale.

Reviews.Title: digital photo viewer
Reviews.Author: Karen Kilgore
Reviews.Content: This works very well for my husband who likes to view pictures from his game camera. He just carries along this digital photo viewer and removes the memory card to view. Saves him a trip to the house with the memory card to view on the computer. Works very well for him. He has problems seeing also and with this he is able to pull it up on the screen and view it very well. He has really enjoyed it. Would recommend this item to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product for the price!
Reviews.Author: C McGurk
Reviews.Content: Pluses:  Large, wonderful display + very easy to use + thinner than a phone + faux-leather case + accepts SD cards for storing GB's of pics!  I love this product and have been waiting for one a long time.  Being a longtime photographer, there was no device (except a very expensive Epson photo viewer), where I could easily transfer photos to an SD card, insert it, and voila, have an instant slideshow of the photos to show family and friends.  If you have more intelligence than a grapefruit (i.e., do not know how to turn on/off a 3 sec button), than this is something you will love.

Reviews.Title: Never heard of "enVue" but so far, I'm NOT impressed!
Reviews.Author: tgs1117
Reviews.Content: We had a "Chinese Christmas" this year with my family and my brother brought this Digital Photo Album as his gift to give away and I, his sister, was the recepient.  Being that I have wanted a Digital Photo Album, I was excited to receive it but I quickly found that it's nothing more than a piece of junk!  I thought it just wouldn't work because after charging it all night, I couldn't get it to come on by pressing the ON button but it did come on when connected to my PC to transfer pictures.  I decided to press REALLY hard on the ON button and I finally was able to get it turned on.  Then I tried the buttons in the center and again found that one of them doesn't work unless pressed really hard - I mean I have to almost stand on it to get it to work and even that doesn't always mean I can get it to work.  I can't imagine it's that hard to get buttons to work on a piece of electronic equipment like this.Bottom line - my advice would be to stay away from this product.  I'm going to see if I can find the manufaturer's website and see if I can send it in for service or a replacement.
